Introduction

Welcome to the WebM VP8 Codec SDK. This SDK allows you to integrate your applications with the VP8 video codec, a high quality, royalty free, open source codec deployed on millions of computers and devices worldwide.

This distribution of the WebM VP8 Codec SDK includes the following support:

  • vp8_encoder- WebM VP8 Decoder

Starting Points

  • Consult the CHANGELOG for a complete list of improvements in this release.
  • The README contains instructions on recompiling the sample applications.
  • Read the usage for a narrative on codec usage.
  • Read the sample code for examples of how to interact with the codec.
  • Common Algorithm Interface reference

Encoder Algorithm Interface reference- Decoder Algorithm Interface reference

Support Options & FAQ

The WebM project is an open source project supported by its community. For questions about this SDK, please mail the apps-devel@webmproject.org list. To contribute, see http://www.webmproject.org/code/contribute and mail codec-devel@webmproject.org.
